item.description: On Thursday, April 26, at 7:15p, The Disproof Atheism Society will present “A Meta-Argument against God from the Arguments for God,” a talk by Robert Lovering, Prof. of Philosophy (CUNY), based on "The Problem of the Theistic Evidentialist Philosophers,” Philo 13, no. 2 (2010): 185-200, www.secure.pdcnet.org/philo/content/philo_2010_0013_0002_0185_0200 . Location: Rm. 442, BU Photonics Center, 8 St. Mary’s St., Boston. Free & open to all. Info: DASociety@aol.com.
item.name: A Meta-Argument against God from the Arguments for God
